text: Sir Simon Hugh Patrick Boyle, KCVO, JP, DL (22 March 1941 - 4 September 2020) was a British business executive and politician. He was Lord Lieutenant of Gwent from 2001 to 2016."Boyle, Sir Simon (High Patrick)" , Who's Who (online edition, Oxford University Press, December 2017). Retrieved 18 January 2018. He died on 4 September 2020 at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:British businesspeople Category:Lord- lieutenants
title: Simon Boyle
